department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the supply and delivery of various Mass Comparators, Draft Covers and Centering Pans on an as and when required basis.
description: Trade Agreement: WTO-AGP / CPTPP ,Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid, Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal, Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No ,Nature of Requirements: suitable for on an as needed basis
duration_in_months: 12 months plus two additional periods extendable
